publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4287 Jamie Hepburn: Cumbernauld Community Park—That the Parliament congratulates Friends of Cumbernauld Community Park on the organisation of the second Fun in the Park day, held on 31 May 2009; notes that this highly successful event builds on last year’s equally successful Fun in the Park day and follows on from the Walk in the Park event on 26 April 2009, which launched the series of recently constructed pathways through Cumbernauld Community Park; further congratulates Friends of Cumbernauld Community Park for all its endeavours, and hopes that these events hasten the formal designation of Cumbernauld Community Park.

S3M-4287 Cumbernauld Community Park (lodged on 1 June 2009) Bob Doris*, John Wilson*, Michael Matheson*, Kenneth Gibson*, Alasdair Allan*, Sandra White*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Bill Kidd*, Aileen Campbell*, Gil Paterson*, Stuart McMillan*
S3M-4287 Cumbernauld Community Park (lodged on 1 June 2009) Margaret Mitchell*

S3M-4287 Jamie Hepburn: Cumbernauld Community Park—That the Parliament congratulates Friends of Cumbernauld Community Park on the organisation of the second Fun in the Park day, held on 31 May 2009; notes that this highly successful event builds on last year’s equally successful Fun in the Park day and follows on from the Walk in the Park event on 26 April 2009, which launched the series of recently constructed pathways through Cumbernauld Community Park; further congratulates Friends of Cumbernauld Community Park for all its endeavours, and hopes that these events hasten the formal designation of Cumbernauld Community Park. Supported by: Bob Doris, John Wilson, Michael Matheson, Kenneth Gibson, Alasdair Allan, Sandra White, Hugh O’Donnell, Bill Kidd, Aileen Campbell, Gil Paterson, Stuart McMillan, Margaret Mitchell
